deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26. Order within 23 hrs 57 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Designed with resilience against everyday wear-and-tear, this rug is kid and pet friendly and perfect for any area of your home such as your bedroom, living room, dining room, kitchen, and hallways
Sleek and functional 0.3” pile height allows for convenient placement in entryways, underneath furniture, and will not obstruct doorways
Easy to clean and maintain, we recommend vacuuming regularly and spot treating any mild stains with carpet cleaner

We recommend using a rug pad to provide extra cushioning and to prevent any possible slipping and sliding on your flooring. Rug pads serve as protective layering piece for your floor and your rug from any wear and tear, extending the life of your rug
body.description: Add a pop of color to your space with this elegant bohemian medallion area rug. With bold bright hues and a center rosette, this floor covering pairs perfectly with any décor from modern to farmhouse Made from soft durable fibers, this rug is perfect for high traffic areas and will last for years to come. Create the space you’ve always dreamed of with our easy to care for and pet-friendly area rugs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Moroccan Rugs with the signature Moroccan blend of color, line, and texture help bring global style to your home turf. Traditional Our traditional rugs are a tasteful combination of centuries-old motifs and modern, easy-care materials. Jute/Natural Fiber The perfect combination of style and durability, our jute and natural fiber rugs bring home effortless sophistication. Shags With a higher pile and irresistible softness, shag rugs make every step delightful.

Bohemian Bright and beautiful, bohemian rugs bring the perfect carefree splash of color and pattern to your room. Contemporary Make it modern! Give your space an edgy look with these abstract and fresh designs. Kids From toddlers to teens and every age in between, spark their creativity with these rug finds. Indoor/Outdoor Bring indoor style to the outdoors with these beautiful waterproof designs.

Finding Your Perfect Rug Size For smaller areas we recommend a 5’ x 8’ - 6’ x 9’. The front of the rug should rest a few inches in front of your sofa. If you are placing the rug under a coffee table, make sure that it can accommodate all four legs of the table. Larger rooms typically require a rug that is between 6’ x 9’ - 8’ x 10’. Place the front legs of the sofa on top of the rug. If you prefer, all four legs may also rest completely on the rug surface. Leaving a space of 18"-24" on all sides of the rug will create a border to frame your living space. If your current set up features furniture floating in the center of the room, we recommend at least a 9’ x 12’. An equal amount of floor space (between 12” - 18”) should be left on all sides if possible. All furniture should sit completely on the rug surface without looking cramped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to put a runner down my hallway to protect my floors. I love it. The colors are we vibrant. After a few days it flattened out from being rolled up very tightly for shipping. I just a heavy object on the ends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant and Beautiful
reviews.reviewText: My picture gives the rug a yellow tint so it doesn't do it justice, but the photos from the seller are spot on. This rug is very vibrant and compliments my dark walls perfectly. It was packaged very securely and only took a couple of days to lay completely flat. This is affordable and the quality and softness is pretty good in my opinion. This was delivered within a few days of placing the order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Quality + Better Than Expected
reviews.reviewText: This rug is amazing - the quality is incredible; a thick rug, extremely plush with vibrant colors that looks very high end. It perfectly blends in our apartment and is not too overpowering. We used this as an area rug for out living room with dark wood floors, a dark wooden chest, and light colored couch. The rug was easily unrolled and had no problem flattening it out on the first day. The backing of the rug is sturdy and hardly slips on wooden floors. I did put a rug mat beneath it just for extra grip but with furniture on top of it, this was probably not needed. The rug arrived a week before the expected delivery date and I was thrilled to receive a nice note from the seller to let me know about the quality care the rug was getting on its way to me.Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great rug for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Great rug for the price. As a household with several cats and dogs I am always on the lookout for a rug that will hold up to the animals but still looks good. This one has fulfilled all expectations, so far. The colour was a bit too pink when I first rolled it out but now I don't mind that at all. And I have read about bad odours and that it won't lay flat. I had no issues. A bit of a smell of a new synthetic rug but dissipated rather quickly. Put a coupla heavy items on the corners for about a day and no roll up since. Looks great in the room, feels good under foot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bright colors. Really an eye catcher. Great quality. Worth every penny

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Even Compliments the Elepahant Table
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this rug after about 5 months of rug-procrastination (if that's a thing). This is probably one of the best purchases I've made in the home acescories department!The colors are beautiful, I know that is a very typical remark to make about rugs, but this one truly has vivid and rich colors. Its vivid without being ghetto lookkng. Haha! :-) The lines in the patterns are great too, your eyes can see the shapes within the design with ease.It goes great with my India/Bohemian themed bedroom- elephants and all. You know something is quality when it can compliment even the elephant accent table. Right?I like to think so.Honestly, I can't find anything negative about this rug. In case anyone is a rug expert, yes- it has the big-huge-massive tag woven into the back that certifies, qualifys, adopts, accepts, loves, and says whatever else about the rug.Dimensions seem true to size as well.Whoever says the colors are dull on this rug... Good God! You are one colorblind sea-sponge, my friend.Very pleased! Don't procrastinate for five months like I did; just stick this sucker in your shopping cart and slam your cursor onto the order button.PRODUCT ORDERED: nuLOOM RZBD32A - COLOR: Pink. - SIZE: 3'X5'

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought the 2x3' as a kitchen mat. Detail isn't as sharp as in the pics, but the price was good and it works well in the kitchen. Won't be a loss when I want to change it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, soft and affordable! It’s worth it
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE IT 😍🤩I am persian and happen to know a little more about the pros and cons of different kinds of rugs and carpets, since I grew up in Iran.That said, I knew what I was looking for (to put on Iranian traditional bench) when I did a search for carpet on Amazon.It’s so beautiful, soft and really worth the price.I picked the pink color and I say it looks even better than the website photo.Truly enjoy my time after work, sitting on the handcrafted bench by my husband. This beautiful carpet has made it even more perfect and paid off the price!We added a 0.5 inch rug pad to add to the thickness to be able to sit on the bench for more hours. It helps.It also works perfectly without the pad, however we just needed one more layer because it’s put on the wood.Love it 😍
Colours are surprisingly vibrant, it’s very soft and so far has held up well for under the small round dining room table

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: makes a nice statement to your room.
reviews.reviewText: just the right price point adds a nice cosy feel to any room good quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: horrible !!!! et chère pour ce que s’est!!!
reviews.reviewText: horrible !!! absolument pas comme sur la photo on peut même pas ditinguer le motif et sa ose appeler cela un tapis persan !! un paillasson oui
Der Teppich ist sehr schön, ein kleines bisschen dünn, aber die Farben sind so schön leuchtend und warm.
